strongly believe that a great job should keep you happy both at work—and in life.Job: UI/UX designerPrimary Location: PuneSchedule: Full-timeStipend : 10000UX Designer Duties and Responsibilities▪Creating and implementing interaction models, user flows, and user interface specifications.▪Communicating scenarios, end-to-end experiences, interaction models, and screen designs.▪Developing and maintaining design wireframes and specifications of best practices to share with design team .This role might be for you if you have▪Degree or Certified course in UI/UX▪Masters preferred▪Excellent IT and programming skills▪2+ years in android /ios development /designing or UX Design.▪Portfolio of sample projects highlighting design for mobile applications & consumer facing web sites and/or applications.▪Interest in constantly keeping up-to-date of latest trends, best practices and competitive activity.▪Ability to work well with ambiguity or when requirements are still desc: I'm looking to create a dashboard that interfaces with UBER and Lyft. When Launched it would then Launch both driver apps and show basic info from both. When a Ride request comes in it automatically switches to that app and waits for the drivers decision to either accept or decline the ride. If ride accepted it will (in the background) go offline and close the other app. When ride is completed and ready to accept another ride it will go back to the dashboard and relaunch and go online the previously closed app. If the ride is declined it simply returns to the dashboard app.This needs to be a simple app that allows a driver to effortlessly operate both UBER and Lyft without having to manually switch back and forth.
title: UBER Lyft Dashboard

desc: We are developing a Mobile App (Android) for people to buy our products. We have completed all the back end work (on PHP). We are now stuck at payment transaction which is to be routed through BHIM.Work done on app so far: When a buyer selects the products purchase value is displayed in Rupees and when buyer clicks "Buy Now" – BHIM App automatically opens (if already installed) – if not installed, then buyer is redirected to Google Play Store to install BHIM App.Buyer can of course make the payment by adding our bank account as beneficiary and then enter the amount that needs to be transferred to our account.The Problem: We want to avoid these steps of  adding beneficiary and the amount to be paid - what we are looking at is, the moment BHIM App opens on his mobile – automatically our UPI ID and the amount of purchase appears – so he has to simply press make payment.Can you help us on this issue by guiding our developer how this can be achieved?
title: Payment Integration through BHIM

desc: I want to build Dummy Fighter game in Unity.I will provide you base unity project and details. Please check this and let me know your budget and timeline.Thanks.Description:Is a simple turn based game containing two scenes: Editor and Fight.Core gameplay is to program Dummy Fighter behavior by dragging and dropping icons in a UI Layout in the Editor scene,with following observation of the engagement in the Fight scene;Each turn has two steps, representing states of the game actor. Each step lasts 0.5 seconds,Idle lasts 1 second, but it's also two steps in game logicThere are five states: Idle, Attack, AttackReturn, Dodge, DodgeReturn, which have respective states in AnimationStateMachine;Combinations of states determine damage dealing and receiving in each state:Idle - Idle: no damage done, no damage received;Attack - Idle: doing the basic damage;Attack - Dodge: no damage done, no damage received;Attack - DodgeReturn: dealing doubled damage;Attack - Attack: both the player and the opponent receiving triple damage;There are four types of gameplay events: Think, Watch, Attack, Dodge.These events are linked to a chain. Events are executed one by one following the chain order by default,but links themselves might change execution order;Think and Watch are correlated with the Idle state, Attack, and Dodge with respective states.* When Think event is triggered, Read the next Link.Replace next Link with a Link of an index calculated based on a number of steps defined by respective event properties forward or backward on the chain.* Watch event also controls the chain execution order. There's 50% chance to read the next opponent's chain event when triggered.In case of success, the next event of player's chain will be a Link with an index calculated based on a number of steps defined by respective event properties forward or backward on the chain.* Attack and Dodge on triggered, just run respective actions without changing the order.
title: Dummy Fighter Game Development.
